title: Along the Inca Road: A Woman's Journey into an Ancient Empire
description: A woman's journey along the ancient "Inca Road" follows the high-altitude spine of an empire across the Andes from Ecuador to Brazil, where she documents the descendents of the Inca with words and images. By the author of Hitchhiking Vietnam. Reprint. 15,000 first printing.
author: Karin Muller
